## Private Member Attributes

### OffsetToIdMap {#aea450d7defd76d68a7f7ae9df03b8897}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>std::map&lt;uint32&#95;t, uint32&#95;t&gt; llvm::BTFStringTable::OffsetToIdMap</>}>
A mapping from string table offset to the index of the Table.

It is used to avoid putting duplicated strings in the table.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/bpf/btfdebug-h/#l00252">252</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/bpf/btfdebug-h">BTFDebug.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
